alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 9:21PM CDT until May 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota and Wisconsin... Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Sherburne, Stearns and Wright Counties. Mississippi River near Hastings L/D 2 affecting Dakota, Washington, Pierce and Goodhue Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River At Hwy 169 at Champlin affecting Anoka and Hennepin Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 9.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 845 PM CDT Sunday was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.4 feet on 05/17/1999. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
